# Create the venv

Environment installation suggestions:

## Windows

1. `py -3.11 -m venv .env`
2. `.\.env\Scripts\activate`
3. `pip install -r env/r1.txt`
4. `pip install -r env/r2.txt`

## Linux

1. `python3 -m venv .env`
2. `source .env/bin/activate`
3. `pip install -r env/r1.txt`
4. `pip install -r env/r2.txt`
